title: Microsoft Schubert: the trout quintet (PC)
brief_description: Experience the spirit and sparkling beauty of Schubert’s Quintet in A Major, from the songs that inspired it, to the era that influenced it, to the man who gave it expression. SYSTEM REQUIREMNTS: A multimedia PC or compatible with 386SX or higher microprocessor, 4MB of memory, 4MB of hard-disk space, CDROM-drive, audio board and VGA display. Microsoft Windows, version 3.1 or later and MS_DOS operating system, version 3.1 or later.
